description:
Well it took a major effort to get Scott to agree to an Edge video, but somehow it happened.
Scott had more limits than most models, so I feared after the craziness of the last one, you all might be disappointed. But after editing it, I'm pretty happy with it. It's a solid addition to the Edge series. Not crazy, but solid.
Just so you know, NO, this video is not part of the DVD compilation, which came out before this video was shot.
As of this writing, there is one more planned, but more could happen if I can keep thinking of fun things to do with them within these guy's limits.
Enjoy!
title: Bryan & Scott - Edge
